name: Farmer's Empire
description:
PRESS SPACE KEY  TO ATTACK WITH THE SWORD!

My submission for the Genre Mash jam. It's a game about helping your kingdom, farming and defending your farm. Make up strategies and hurry up, because it's gets pretty hard! 

You are a professional farmer and former knight, and you need to provide food for your soldiers. But be careful, monsters may eat your crops!

Build defenses to protect your crops. Make money to buy land and expand your farm. Help your kingdom!

You will need to learn the monster's behaviours and plant crops strategically in order to protect as many of them as possible.
